channel.title: Anyone? Title Problem. Please help!
channel.description:
[tt]I dont know how to create titles. Like `` OwnerCarlo: Hi.[/tt] [tt]Or ``AdministratorCarlo: Hi [/tt] [tt]Or ``ModCarlo: Hi[/tt] This is on RuneScape aswell.
[shadow=blue,left]I opened a very nice server with 2034 features, im going to release it when i close the server. So, i would really like to know it. Cause, i forgot it. I have been working on the server in 3 years now. And finally its done! Please help.[/shadow]

item.title: Anyone? Title Problem. Please help!
item.dc:creator: @BanGlitch BanGlitch
item.description:

[tt]I dont know how to create titles. Like OwnerCarlo: Hi.[/tt] [tt]OrAdministratorCarlo: Hi [/tt]
[tt]Or ``ModCarlo: Hi[/tt]
This is on RuneScape aswell.

[shadow=blue,left]I opened a very nice server with 2034 features, im going to release it when i close the server.
So, i would really like to know it. Cause, i forgot it.
I have been working on the server in 3 years now. And finally its done! Please help.[/shadow]
